text: Khto zh nespravedlyvishyy za toho, komu nahadaly pro znamennya Hospoda yoho, a vin znekhtuvav nymy y zabuv pro svoyi vchynky? Voistynu, My nakryly yikhni sertsya zavisoyu, shchob ne zrozumily vony [Koranu]. Vukha yikhni vrazyla hlukhota! Yakshcho ty poklychesh yikh na pryamyy shlyakh, to vony nikoly ne stanutʹ na nʹoho
